definition: definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]
to peel with a knife/to pare/to cut (a ball at tennis etc)

sentences.english: Filters for fuel oil, lube oil, hydraulic power line oil, cutting oil.
sentences.chinese: 用於燃油，潤滑油，液壓油切削油的過濾器。

sentences.english: CSE Cutter delays the onset of fracturing and cutter wear.
sentences.chinese: CSE齒延緩切削齒的破裂和磨損。

sentences.english: Excellent performance at dry cutting conditon.
This course is an introduction to basic metal-cutting principles and their practical applications.
sentences.chinese: 本課程介紹基本的金屬切削原理及其實務應用。

sentences.english: An important part of NC tools is to increase the cutting and feeding speeds.
sentences.chinese: 數控刀具是提高切削和進刀速度的重要環節。

sentences.english: The laser removes tissue from the cornea very accurately without damaging nearby tissues.
sentences.chinese: 激光可以非常精確地切削角膜組織且不損傷鄰近組織。

sentences.english: Bucket cutting edges of abrasive-resistant steel of up to 500 Brinell.
sentences.chinese: 剷鬥切削刀刃爲抗磨料磨損鋼材，布氏硬度達500。

sentences.english: A new non-chip cutting-press compound shaping technique of fin tube was presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種新的翅片管無屑切削擠壓複合成形方法。

sentences.english: GILDEMEISTER as a manufacturer of cutting machine tools, holds a leading position worldwide as a full-liner.
sentences.chinese: 吉特邁集團是全球領先的切削機牀製造商。

sentences.english: The up-to-date research progress of the finite element analysis of soil cutting is reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了用有限元法分析土壤切削問題的研究進展情況。

sentences.english: This paper deals first with the basic principles of the thermo-electric effect in metal cutting.
sentences.chinese: 本文首先闡明瞭金屬切削中熱電效應的基本原理。

sentences.english: Diamond is the best material of cutting-tools to cut nonferrous metals.
sentences.chinese: 金剛石是切削有色金屬的優選刀具材料。

sentences.english: Such parts could damage stone-crushing machines, vibratory equipment, or wood-chipping machines.
sentences.chinese: 這些部分可能損害碎石機，振動設備，或木材切削機。

sentences.english: Reaming consists of removing a small amount of metal from a hole already drilled.
sentences.chinese: 絞孔是在一個已鑽好孔的基礎上再切削少量的金屬。

sentences.english: The oil cutting fluid has the wide foreground of researching and developing.
sentences.chinese: 油基切削液的研究和發展有廣闊前景。

sentences.english: The course involves a presentation of the mechanical and metallurgical fundamentals of metal machining.
sentences.chinese: 本課程介紹金屬切削時機械和金相學的基礎。

definition: shining metal/(old) the 16th of the month (abbreviation used in telegrams)
end face/end surface of a cylindrical object
to straighten/(fig.) to mend one's ways
to widen a tube/to ream (i.e. widen a hole)
